comments.comment: The question is he open the pack cooked the pack and when ready to eat is when he saw the so called worms from the conversation he knows there are 10 worms as after 9 found he looks for the 10th one ... but my question is when makeing it did he not notice this ? As when you open the pack you look when you break the noodle pack you see it when you cook it you see it and when you plate it you see it  why did he not see this ? The rest prima lawyers  will answer . This looks like he planted the worms in the prima noodle pack . Then video it . These worms are maggots found in rotting meat ....but see the noodle has no meat it's starch carbohydrate.  If taken to courts prima has a good case . Against the video clip and against this guy . I think they should take it to court.  Deformation of trade name and product .
